thread.title: Donald Trump: Seth Meyers calls him Tiger Woods of hypocrisy
thread.title_full: Donald Trump: Seth Meyers calls him Tiger Woods of hypocrisy

author: Nick Romano
title: Donald Trump: Seth Meyers calls him Tiger Woods of hypocrisy
text:
Email 
Seth Meyers took a swing at Donald Trump on Late Night Thursday for the president’s efforts to hide his golfing habits from the press — even though Trump previously lambasted Barack Obama for hitting the course. “Some of you might be saying, ‘But he criticized Obama for golfing, what about that?’ Well, you are forgetting that when it comes to being a hypocrite, Donald Trump has a zero handicap,” Meyers said. “He’s the Tiger Woods of hypocrisy.” 
The host joked that Trump could be mistaken for “a San Diego dentist” over reports that POTUS played golf six times in one month. Meanwhile, Republican congressmen are getting dragged through the mud by their constituents in massive town hall assemblies across the country. 
“Look, it’s not easy being a member of Congress these days, facing down angry voters at rowdy town halls, standing under those hot lights, getting yelled at by your constituents. I’m sure they’d love to get out of there and just relax for a while, like this guy,” Meyers said, pointing to a photo of Trump. 
“Trump and Republicans in Congress are facing a massive backlash over their plan to repeal ObamaCare, because they have nothing better to offer,” he added, joking that “we’re all gonna need Tums, as I’m pretty sure it’s the thing Republicans have for a replacement to Obamacare. With Tums and Advil, you get to choose your own healthcare: Tums or Advil.” 
Watch Meyers in the clip above. Show Full Article
